Privacy Policy

At The Tileart, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

Effective Date: June 28, 2025

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website, interact with us, or use our services. Please read it carefully, and contact us if you have any questions.

1 Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

Personal Information

Name, email address, phone number, address, payment details, and other information you provide when placing an order, creating an account, or contacting us.

Device and Usage Data

IP address, browser type, operating system, and information about how you interact with our website (e.g., pages viewed, time spent on site).

Cookies and Tracking Technologies

Information collected using cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies to enhance your experience.

2 How We Use Your Information

We use the information we collect for purposes including:

Providing and delivering our products and services
Processing payments securely
Responding to your inquiries or requests
Sending promotional offers, updates, and important notifications (you can opt out of marketing communications anytime)
Improving and personalizing our website and offerings
Complying with legal obligations and resolving disputes

3 How We Share Your Information

We respect your privacy and do not sell your personal information.

However, we may share data with:

Service Providers

Trusted third parties who assist with payment processing, order fulfillment, analytics, advertising, and customer support.

Business Transfers

If we merge, acquire, or sell our company, your data may be transferred as part of the transaction.

Legal Authorities

When required to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

4 Cookies and Similar Technologies

We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. They help us:

Understand how users interact with our site

Provide relevant advertisements and personalized content

Remember your preferences and improve site functionality

Cookie Management: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling cookies may impact your website experience.

5 Your Rights

Depending on your location and applicable laws, you may have the following rights regarding your data:

Access

Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

Correction

Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information

Deletion

Request deletion of your personal data (subject to certain exceptions)

Opt-Out

Opt out of marketing communications or data use for targeted advertising

Data Portability

Request data transfer to another service provider

Verification

We may require verification of your identity before processing requests

To exercise your rights: Please contact us at privacy@tileart.com. We may require verification of your identity before processing your request.

6 Data Security

We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

However, no security method is 100% foolproof, and we cannot guarantee absolute data security.

7 Data Retention

We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, comply with legal requirements, or resolve disputes.

8 Third-Party Services

Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties.

We recommend reviewing their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

9 Updates to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. The updated policy will be posted on this page with the "Effective Date" updated accordingly.

10 Contact Us

For questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us:

The Tileart

113, Krishi Vihar, Vardhman Vihar, Jaipur
privacy@tileart.com
+91 9667725508

Our Commitment

We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and transparently. Your privacy and data protection are our top priorities.
